Invocation Name: charm of christmas past
des:
To be played alongside The Charm of Christmas Past boxed escape game. An
immersive, narrative driven adventure that begins with you as the unsuspecting
beneficiary of part of the estate of Winifred Maud Brisley. Who, upon the 100th
anniversary of her passing, instructed that one thousand households across the
glove receive a bequest from her estate.
What is it?
A festive play-at-home escape room chronicle with an enveloping narrative that will
captivate your imagination and unearth the true meaning of Christmas. Journey
back through time, solving conundrums and enigmas of Christmases past.
To help you on your journey:
X= Clue number 1 or 2, Y= Puzzle page title, Z= Puzzle Answer
Say "Alexa ask Charm of Christmas Past for clue number X for Y” to receive a
clue.
Say "Alexa ask Charm of Christmas Past for intro for Y" to repeat the puzzle
audio.
Say "Alexa ask Charm of Christmas Past to give the answer to Y” to receive
the answer and move onto the next puzzle.
Say "Alexa ask Charm of Christmas Past if the answer to Y is Z” to input your
puzzle answer.
If you need help, just ask.
What do you get?
Once you’ve made a purchase of The Charm of Christmas Past, you’ll receive a
package filled to the brim with 20+ individual trinkets and handcrafted curios of
exceptional quality. To accompany your adventure you will also receive pages from
a beautiful storybook, laced with painted illustrations. The Charm of Christmas past
is a narrated puzzle experience that brings the spirit of Christmas to life.
Issues or Feedback? We want to hear from you, please contact us at:
erboxandboardgames@gmail.com
